content:
一直都很喜歡Bernardo，不過一直沒機會出也沒搭檔了
某次外拍意外發現帶個眼鏡好像有點Bernardo
就當作Bernardo再跟Gian吃麥當勞圓夢一下吧(X)

I like Bernardo for a long time, but did not have a chance to cos him or a partner to do this cos with. 
At one photoshooting I was just playing with glasses and put it on, surprisely, I do look like Bernardo.
Well, I guess this picture just pertend to be Gian and Bernardo getting Breakfast together in McDonald just to fulfill my dream(X)
